Description: Verify Successful Login and Navigation to DVC Home Page
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home click on button start flow 1 --> navigate to Page dvc-login
step 3: At Page dvc-login click on body object
step 4: At Page dvc-login input on input username
step 5: At Page dvc-login input on input password
step 6: At Page dvc-login click on button login --> navigate to Page dvc-home
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page dvc-home

Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page dvc-home tax-form1
step 2: At Page dvc-home tax-form1 input on input combo box demo
step 3: At Page dvc-home tax-form1 click on div object
step 4: Add visual checkpoint at Page dvc-home tax-form1

Description: Verify Successful Navigation to Contact Page
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page contact
step 2: Add visual checkpoint at Page contact
